body_html: @F3PiX I just restarted the build and it went green. I think my recent ajaxification of the comments controller (468100a) is to blame here, although I'm not sure yet what exactly causes the test to flake.
body_text: @F3PiX I just restarted the build and it went green. I think my recent ajaxification of the comments controller (468100a) is to blame here, although I'm not sure yet what exactly causes the test to flake.
body: @F3PiX I just restarted the build and it went green. I think my recent ajaxification of the comments controller (https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/commit/468100ab410be6086e8f0b527960a941e39387c9) is to blame here, although I'm not sure yet what exactly causes the test to flake.
